title: People or persons? | English #shorts
author: English with Max
comment: Thank you for new lesson and it fascinates me bz never before have I ever been aware of the difference between persons and people .  Sometimes I might have found the word ' persons 'being used in Report Writing , for example 25 persons went missing during the violent storm that occurred yesterday evening near costal areas .  Is this sentence grammatically correct ? 🙏
Brief and interesting. I like this approach. Many thanks!
Wow, Max, using the new feature of YouTube Shorts? A good start for your first video! ☺️ All the best! ❤️️ I am always glad to watch you.

I love your class 
Amo Tus classes
description:
When do we use "people" and when do we use "persons"? They are both plural forms of "person", but they are not exactly interchangeable.

In this video we'll look at people versus persons.
